review: a wonderful piece of art with subtle dark humour which i thought was only done by foreign directors like tarantino, then found vishal bhardwaj was a fan of quentin and did his job really well!
some of the best movies you'll see in a bollywood must watch list. this movie is crazy, and when it comes to drama, it's as good as any hollywood movie.

the acting done by all the actors is just awsome......
the movie story is really nice,i personally just loved the film....‚ù§
